RumorFact.Text: Icy Ridges East Settlement called upon the Ravenous Tides settlement to aid with relief after a natural disaster at Icy Ridges West Settlement.

ExploreFact.Text: Icy Ridges is being rapidly depopulated as people flee, fearing its unpredictable weather.

RumorFact.Text: Salmon mentioned a settlement that was recently destroyed on Icy Ridges.
The East Settlement received a transmission from the West Settlement saying that it was being destroyed by a tornado, and requested aid.
Carp says they left observations of Icy Ridges' climate in the destroyed settlement.

ExploreFact.Text: The Icy Ridges West Settlement was destroyed by the sudden appearance of a tornado.
Heat is seemingly created everywhere at once on Icy Ridges, violating the laws of physics, and the opposite of what is happening on Warm Embrace.
Electrical charge is continually building up on Icy Ridges.

RumorFact.Text: Minnow says there is a Precursor ruin near the East Settlement.

ExploreFact.Text: The Precursors built something called the "final node".
One of the Precursors, Nela, warned that this node would build up massive amounts of heat and electricity while charging, increasing power-up time.
One of the Precursors, Kasili, had ethical concerns about the weapon they were building, and that the other Precursors were blinded by their quest for revenge.
The Precursors were building a weapon to take revenge on an enemy that attacked them.
